overview: Having lived an incompetent life to the age nearing mid 40s, GOODMAN suspects something out of ordinary in one of those days, only to receive the confession that his wife had been cheating. While feeling more regretful than ever on his miserable life, GOODMAN encounters the unexpected scene that local thugs harassing a street hobo for no reason at the bar parking lot and begins very brutal slaughter.
title: A Good Man
